Name: Diki-Diki
Ingredients: 50 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Fruity yet tart. Apple brandy and grapefruit with the distinctive twang of Swedish Punch.
History: Adapted from Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Diki-Diki contains 191 calories
